messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the heads up. Some great books here!
Paul

still

> Craig

messages.subject: Re: Books for sale
messages.msgSnippet: Roger and all, Look under Reference Books rather than Documents Books.  Plenty still there, all retail prices. Craig -- Craig Harris Books from and about
messages.messageBody:
Roger and all,

Look under "Reference Books" rather than "Documents Books." Plenty still
there, all retail prices.

Craig



--
Craig Harris
Books from and about Asia
www.bridgeofdreams.com

On Jan 3, 2008 6:40 PM, Roger Robertshaw <rogerr@...> wrote:

> Hi,
>
> The Japanese section says "Sold Out" !
> Boy that was quick!
>
>
> At 06:19 AM 4/1/2008, you wrote:
>
> Hi all -
>
> A friend of mine is "selling out" his books and I suggested listing his
> site here so everyone can at least take a look. His name is Jon Jensen:
> www.jons-swords.com and go to his books listing. My understanding is that
> Jon wants to move things out so maybe -- maybe not -- there might be some
> bargains.
>
> Just thought I'd mention this to you all...

> Kind regards,
